name: Sean! Are You Listening? (GGJ 2019)
description:
Everyone’s come home for the holidays. Visiting your Aunt Sarah’s place, you finally get to experience “ESCAPE FROM MURDER HOUSE ‘95”, which your parents forbid you to play. But at the chaotic family gathering, winning won’t be easy.

Can you beat the High Score set by your older brother, while trying to survive mundane conversations with all your relatives?

Originally created for the 48 Hour Global Game Jam 2018. Theme: Home

=======================================================
